attributes.action: Make a special case to keep the existing Childcare adn Education  Diplomas (level 3) alongside the new diplomas
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
When we are striving for a world class children’s workforce, The DEMISE OF the specialist Childcare & Education diplomas offered by BTEC & CACHE will not be funded and therefore cannot be offered.  Options will be limited to:
1.New Diploma – Society Health and development –limited early childhood care and education content

2.Apprenticeships –  candidates can access level 2 via a programme led pathway however  will have to have level 2 and  be in paid employment before they can access level 3

3. A levels

There will be no suitable direct entry qualifications at level 3. The highly valued Diplomas in CCLD will not be available to the high flyers that currently enter learning at level
These students will not be able to access level 3 apprenticeships because of the level of responsibility needed to evidence the NVQ, which can only be met if a candidate is employed at a supervisory level, not appropriate for a 16 year old with no experience.
We will lose these aspiring, professional practitioners and the work in raising the profile of careers in the children’s workforce to 'A Profession' will be lost.
